A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is awful. It intentionally sets out to destroy Star Wars lore and characters. It even says so right in your face\, breaking the fourth wall (it's good at that). This is an awful Star Wars movie\, and an objectively bad film overall in terms of character\, theme\, editing etc. \n\nAs a Star Wars fan\, this was depressing. As a non fan\, someone who just wants to kill 2 hours\, you might find it tolerable if you don't think about it at all.
